entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who looked horrified at the idea of being paid. She closed her fingers slightly so that her face was half-hidden again.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is getting up to all sorts of high jinks and is not supposed to have fun.

entities.name: department for the regulation and control of magical creatures
entities.description: The Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures is an organization that Dobby was in front of.

relationships.description: Winky criticizes Dobby's behavior, saying he is getting up to all sorts of high jinks and should settle down.
Harry defends Dobby, saying it's about time he had a bit of fun.
